original_text: And Esther said, “If it please the king, let the king and Haman come today to a feast that I have prepared for the king.”
korean_text: 에스더가 이르되 오늘 내가 왕을 위하여 잔치를 베풀었사오니 왕이 좋게 여기시거든 하만과 함께 오소서 하니

sentences.original_text: let the king and Haman come today
to a feast that I have prepared for the king.
